io.simplesource.saga.client.api

Class SagaClientBuilder<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.simplesource.saga.client.api.SagaClientBuilder<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - a representation of an action command that is shared across all actions in the saga. This is typically a generic type, such as Json, or if using Avro serialization, SpecificRecord or GenericRecord

    public final class SagaClientBuilder<A>
extends Object
    The saga client builder is used to create a SagaAPI.

    To create an instance of a SagaAPI, use code like this: 

    
 SagaAPI<A> sagaApi = SagaClientBuilder
     .create(a -> a.withBootstrapServers("kafka_broker:9092"))
     .withSerdes(serdes)
     .withClientId(clientId)
     .withScheduler(scheduler)
     .build();
